module.name: System Dashboard
module.description: Provides a system information dashboard, showing information about Calls, CPU, Memory, Disks, Network, and processes.
module.changelog: *0.2.5* #2142 fix online phones for Asterisk 1.4 format, #2140 divide by 0 again *0.2.4* #2133 again, #2140 divide by 0, #2141 with temp log to determine real issue *0.2.3* #2133 fixed number format error resulting in bogus percentage displays *0.2.2* #2131 fix Undefined Index warnings *0.2.1* make module permanent, should not be able to disable *0.2.0* Add real-time updates *0.1.0* Initial release
